import React,{createContext,useState,useEffect,useCallback}from'react';import{checkAuth,login as apiLogin,logout as apiLogout,register as apiRegister}from'../services/auth';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AuthContext=/*#__PURE__*/createContext();export const AuthProvider=_ref=>{let{children}=_ref;const[user,setUser]=useState(null);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const verifyAuth=useCallback(async()=>{setLoading(true);try{const response=await checkAuth();console.log('[DEBUG] Resposta de checkAuth:',response);if(response&&response.user){console.log('[DEBUG] Usuário autenticado:',response.user);setUser(response.user);return true;}else{console.warn('[DEBUG] Nenhum usuário retornado em checkAuth.');setUser(null);return false;}}catch(error){console.error('[DEBUG] Erro durante verifyAuth:',error);setUser(null);return false;}finally{setLoading(false);console.log('[DEBUG] Finalizando verifyAuth - loading:',false);}},[]);const login=useCallback(async credentials=>{try{const response=await apiLogin(credentials);console.log('[DEBUG] Resposta de login:',response);setUser(response.user);localStorage.setItem('token',response.token);return{success:true};}catch(error){console.error('[DEBUG] Erro durante login:',error);return{success:false,error:error.message};}},[]);const register=useCallback(async userData=>{try{const response=await apiRegister(userData);console.log('[DEBUG] Resposta de register:',response);setUser(response.user);localStorage.setItem('token',response.token);return{success:true};}catch(error){console.error('[DEBUG] Erro durante register:',error);return{success:false,error:error.message};}},[]);const logout=useCallback(async()=>{try{await apiLogout();console.log('[DEBUG] Logout realizado com sucesso.');setUser(null);localStorage.removeItem('token');return{success:true};}catch(error){console.error('[DEBUG] Erro durante logout:',error);return{success:false,error:error.message};}},[]);useEffect(()=>{console.log('[DEBUG] Iniciando verificação de autenticação...');verifyAuth();},[verifyAuth]);useEffect(()=>{console.log('[DEBUG] Estado atualizado - user:',user);console.log('[DEBUG] Estado atualizado - loading:',loading);},[user,loading]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AuthContext.Provider,{value:{user,loading,login,logout,register,verifyAuth},children:children});};export const useAuth=()=>{const context=React.useContext(AuthContext);if(!context){throw new Error('useAuth deve ser usado dentro de um AuthProvider');}return context;};export default AuthContext;
